means: existing 现存的，目前的，实在的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"存在"之意。
means: exist ： 通常指可观察到的或众所周知的存在现象。
be ： 指某时某地确存在的事物或现象，多与there连用。
live ： 多指有生命的东西的存在。指无生命事物时，强调可联想起生命的那些特点。

sentence.Network_en: I would have to learn, little by little, to exist alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 我得慢慢学会独自生活。

sentence.Network_en: For all practical purposes the treaty has already ceased to exist.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上协议已经不复存在。

sentence.Network_en: He thought that if he couldn't see something, it didn't exist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为自己看不见的东西就不存在。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: probably a back-formation from existence

entry.def: If something exists, it is present in the world as a real thing.

example.ex: He thought that if he couldn't see something, it didn't exist...
example.tran: 他认为自己看不见的东西就不存在。

example.ex: Research opportunities exist in a wide range of pure and applied areas of entomology...
example.tran: 纯理论昆虫学和应用昆虫学的众多领域都存在着研究机会。

entry.def: To exist means to live, especially under difficult conditions or with very little food or money.

example.ex: I exist from one visit to the next...
example.tran: 我的生活就是一个接一个的访问。

sentences.sentence: "he could barely exist on such a low wage"
"Can you live on $2000 a month in New York City?"
"Many people in the world have to subsist on $1 a day"

auth_sentence.content: I guess it means they don't exist either.
auth_sentence.res_content: I guess it means they don't exist either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I guess it means they don't exist either.

auth_sentence.content: Life based on meaning and values does not exist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Life based on meaning and values does not exist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Life based on meaning and values does not exist.

auth_sentence.content: They both exist in our world... our reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: They both exist in our world... our reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They both exist in our world... our reality.

Sentence.sentence: Old technology sometimes continues to exist because of its reliability.
Large companies have a difficult time switching into new markets because there is a temptation to put existing assets into the new businesses.
They find it costly to give up their existing assets

Some propose storing the CO2 in coal mines or liquid storage in the ocean, Shell favors storing CO2 in deep geological structures such as saline(盐的) formations and exhausted oil and gas fields that exist throughout the world.
It runs counter to the existing literature on the subject.
They urge the government to revise its existing public policies

sentences.en: There exist many sources of energy both potential and kinetic.
sentences.cn: 存在着许多势能和动能的能源。

means.word_mean: 生存, 活下来, 幸存

sentences.cn: 人没有氧气就不能生存。

means.word_mean: (尤指在特殊的条件下或在特定的场所)发现，发生，出现；现存；具有；找得到

sentences.en: Hunger exists in many parts of the world.
sentences.cn: 世界许多地方都发生饥荒。

means.word_mean: 持续存在，继续存在，继续生存

sentences.cn: 对魔法的迷信仍存在着。

means.word_mean: (人)苦度日子，(尤指在逆境中)生活；得到基本的生活必需品(如食物和住所)

sentences.en: He exists on bread and water.

jushi.english: Racism still exists to varying degrees.
jushi.chinese: 种族主义仍不同程度地存在着。

jushi.english: A life free from all worry just doesn't exist.
jushi.chinese: 无忧无虑的生活就是不存在。

jushi.english: They were so poor that they did not live but merely existed.
jushi.chinese: 他们穷得只能算生存,不能算生活。
